>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.wFTC0sGqdpnZUib4]{Gear Boost}

The massive weapons you carry give you more heft when pushing others around. When you successfully perform a combat maneuver to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#bull-rush]{Bull Rush} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#reposition]{Reposition} a target while wielding a melee weapon with the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.Nrf6oy9pJwcEmryP.JournalEntryPage.nXkFsyxk7Vybdn7G#unwieldy]{Unwieldy} property, increase the result of your melee attack roll by 5 when determining how far you move your target.
